title: Find Sum Of N Natural Numbers
ruby:
print "Enter a number : "
n = gets.chomp.to_i
sum = (n*(n+1))/2
print "Sum : #{sum}"
swift:
import Swift
import Foundation

var n = 5
var sum = (n * (n + 1)/2)
print("sum: ", sum)
description:
## Write a program to find sum of n natural numbers

```txt
Input  : 5
Output : 15
```
